keyword: how many calories in crab rangoon
title: How Many Calories in Crab Rangoon?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in crab rangoon per piece, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Crab Rangoon?
assumptions: Fried crab rangoon appetizer with imitation crab, cream cheese, green onions, and wonton wrapper; standard size (~25g per piece).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, frying method, portion size, and ingredients; restaurant versions may differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One crab rangoon contains about 55 kcal, mostly from the fried wrapper and cream cheese.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp sweet chili dipping sauce
Use real crab and reduce cream cheese

faqs.q: How many calories in one crab rangoon?
What are the carbs in crab rangoon?
faqs.a: About 6 g carbs per piece, mainly from the wonton wrapper.

faqs.q: Is crab rangoon high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 150 mg per piece due to seasonings and imitation crab.

faqs.q: How does baking affect calories in crab rangoon?
faqs.a: Baking reduces calories by about 20 kcal per piece by cutting oil absorption.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in crab rangoon?
faqs.a: Roughly 2 g protein per piece, from the crab filling.
